title: Pediatric meniscal surgery in Italy: A 10-year epidemiological nationwide registry study
content:

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 15

Author(s): Andrea Riganti, Marco Bigoni, Edoardo Pierpaoli, Marco Caliandro, Daniele Piscitelli, Nicolas Nicolaou, Luca Rigamonti, Marco Turati
